wikitext.*:
'''Alandri''' were the [[fays]] of the woods, according to the early version of the [[legendarium]] associated with ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''.<ref name=Ala>{{PE|14}}, "[[The Creatures of the Earth]]", pp. 7, 10</ref>

== Etymology ==
The name ''Alandri''<ref group=note>The name ''Alandri'' was changed from an earlier, unfinished form ''ald''-.</ref> is in [[Qenya]], and was based on the word ''[[aldarë]]'' ("wood"), which was probably derived from the word ''[[alda]]'' ("tree").<ref name=Ala/> The word ''alda'' itself comes from the root [[ALA]] ("spread?").<ref>{{PE|12}}, entry '''ALA''' (2), p. 29</ref>
